@concat('WITH NEGO AS (SELECT * FROM ',pipeline().parameters.SCHEMA,'.CC_DATA_FACTORY_NEGOTIATION_VALUE WHERE DATA_ID = ',pipeline().parameters.dataId,' AND PROCESS_TYPE LIKE ''02%'' ORDER BY DATA_NEGO_ID ASC OFFSET 0 ROWS)
MERGE ',pipeline().parameters.SCHEMA,'.CC_NEGOTIATION_VALUE AS TARGET
USING NEGO AS SOURCE
ON (TARGET.ACCNT_ID = SOURCE.ACCNT_ID)
WHEN MATCHED AND TARGET.BILLING_ACCNT_ID = SOURCE.BILLING_ACCNT_ID 
THEN 
UPDATE
SET
TARGET.REF_ROW_ID = SOURCE.ROW_ID,
TARGET.CREATED = SOURCE.CREATED,
TARGET.CREATED_BY = SOURCE.CREATED_BY,
TARGET.LAST_UPD = SOURCE.LAST_UPD,
TARGET.LAST_UPD_BY = SOURCE.LAST_UPD_BY,
TARGET.REQ_ID = SOURCE.REQ_ID,
TARGET.ACCNT_ID = SOURCE.ACCNT_ID,
TARGET.BILLING_ACCNT_ID = SOURCE.BILLING_ACCNT_ID,
TARGET.NEGO_CREDIT_LIMIT = SOURCE.NEGO_CREDIT_LIMIT,
TARGET.AR_BALANCE = SOURCE.AR_BALANCE,
TARGET.AVAILABLE_FOR_MONTHLY = SOURCE.AVAILABLE_FOR_MONTHLY,
TARGET.PRICE_MAIN_PRO = SOURCE.PRICE_MAIN_PRO,
TARGET.MULTIPLIER = SOURCE.MULTIPLIER,
TARGET.BA_SCORE_RANGE = SOURCE.BA_SCORE_RANGE,
TARGET.CL_BEFORE_NEGO = SOURCE.CL_BEFORE_NEGO,
TARGET.REASON_BEF_NEGO = SOURCE.REASON_BEF_NEGO,
TARGET.CUSTOMER_REQUEST_FLG = SOURCE.CUSTOMER_REQUEST_FLG,
TARGET.CUS_REQ_BALANCE = SOURCE.CUS_REQ_BALANCE,
TARGET.NEGO_STATUS = SOURCE.NEGO_STATUS,
TARGET.REASON_CODE = SOURCE.REASON_CODE,
TARGET.CHANNEL = SOURCE.CHANNEL,
TARGET.CL_BEFORE_NEGO_PERM = SOURCE.CL_BEFORE_NEGO_PERM,
TARGET.CL_BEFORE_NEGO_TEMP = SOURCE.CL_BEFORE_NEGO_TEMP
WHEN NOT MATCHED BY TARGET 
THEN INSERT (REF_ROW_ID,
CREATED,
CREATED_BY,
LAST_UPD,
LAST_UPD_BY,
REQ_ID,
ACCNT_ID,
BILLING_ACCNT_ID,
NEGO_CREDIT_LIMIT,
AR_BALANCE,
AVAILABLE_FOR_MONTHLY,
PRICE_MAIN_PRO,
MULTIPLIER,
BA_SCORE_RANGE,
CL_BEFORE_NEGO,
REASON_BEF_NEGO,
CUSTOMER_REQUEST_FLG,
CUS_REQ_BALANCE,
NEGO_STATUS,
REASON_CODE,
CHANNEL,
CL_BEFORE_NEGO_PERM,CL_BEFORE_NEGO_TEMP ) VALUES (SOURCE.ROW_ID,
SOURCE.CREATED,
SOURCE.CREATED_BY,
SOURCE.LAST_UPD,
SOURCE.LAST_UPD_BY,
SOURCE.REQ_ID,
SOURCE.ACCNT_ID,
SOURCE.BILLING_ACCNT_ID,
SOURCE.NEGO_CREDIT_LIMIT,
SOURCE.AR_BALANCE,
SOURCE.AVAILABLE_FOR_MONTHLY,
SOURCE.PRICE_MAIN_PRO,
SOURCE.MULTIPLIER,
SOURCE.BA_SCORE_RANGE,
SOURCE.CL_BEFORE_NEGO,
SOURCE.REASON_BEF_NEGO,
SOURCE.CUSTOMER_REQUEST_FLG,
SOURCE.CUS_REQ_BALANCE,
SOURCE.NEGO_STATUS,
SOURCE.REASON_CODE,
SOURCE.CHANNEL,
SOURCE.CL_BEFORE_NEGO_PERM,
SOURCE.CL_BEFORE_NEGO_TEMP);')
